item.title: Portal...help
item.dc:creator: @sh999 sh999
item.description:

case 7352: // runecraft
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage("You teled to the Runecraft Area , No ess needed have fun !");
teleportToX = 3040;
teleportToY = 4835;
heightLevel = 0;
updateRequired = true; 
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

how can i make that into… when i click on the portal it says “Do you want to go to the Runecraft area”
“yes” or “no”
